template.template: Template Net Morningstar ProStar PWM SNMP
template.name: Template Net Morningstar ProStar PWM SNMP
template.description:
MIBs used: PROSTAR-PWM
Template tooling version used: 0.38

item.name: Array: Voltage
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Array Voltage Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:V Range:[0, 80] Modbus address:0x0013

item.name: Battery: Charge Current
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Charge Current Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:A Range:[0, 40] Modbus address:0x0011

item.name: Battery: Charge State
item.description:
MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Control State Modbus address:0x0021
0: Start 1: NightCheck 2: Disconnect 3: Night 4: Fault 5: Bulk 6: Pwm 7: Float 8: Equalize

trigger.name: Battery: Device charge in warning state

dependency.name: Battery: Device charge in critical state

trigger.name: Battery: Device charge in critical state

item.name: Counter: Charge Amp-hours
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Ah Charge (Resettable) Scaling Factor:0.1 Units:Ah Range:[0.0, 4294967294] Modbus addresses:H=0x0026 L=0x0027

item.name: Counter: Charge KW-hours
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Kilowatt Hours Charge (Resettable) Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:kWh Range:[0.0, 65535] Modbus address:0x002A

item.name: Counter: Load Amp-hours
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Ah Load (Resettable) Scaling Factor:0.1 Units:Ah Range:[0.0, 4294967294] Modbus addresses:H=0x0032 L=0x0033

item.name: Load: Current
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Load Current Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:A Range:[0, 60] Modbus address:0x0016

item.name: Load: State
item.description:
MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Load State Modbus address:0x002E
0: Start 1: Normal 2: LvdWarning 3: Lvd 4: Fault 5: Disconnect 6: NormalOff 7: Override 8: NotUsed

trigger.name: Load: Device load in warning state

dependency.name: Load: Device load in critical state
dependency.expression: {Template Net Morningstar ProStar PWM SNMP:load.state[loadState.0].last()}={$LOAD.STATE.CRIT:"lvd"} or {Template Net Morningstar ProStar PWM SNMP:load.state[loadState.0].last()}={$LOAD.STATE.CRIT:"fault"}

trigger.name: Load: Device load in critical state

item.name: Load: Voltage
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Load Voltage Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:V Range:[0, 80] Modbus address:0x0014

item.name: Status: Alarms
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Alarms Modbus addresses:H=0x0038 L=0x0039

trigger.name: Status: Device has "rtsShorted" alarm flag
Status: Device has "rtsDisconnected" alarm flag
Status: Device has "heatsinkTempSensorOpen" alarm flag
Status: Device has "heatsinkTempSensorShorted" alarm flag
Status: Device has "heatsinkTempLimit" alarm flag
Status: Device has "currentLimit" alarm flag
Status: Device has "currentMeasurementError" alarm flag
Status: Device has "batterySenseOutOfRange" alarm flag
Status: Device has "batterySenseDisconnected" alarm flag
Status: Device has "uncalibrated" alarm flag
Status: Device has "batteryTempOutOfRange" alarm flag
Status: Device has "fp10SupplyOutOfRange" alarm flag
Status: Device has "mosfetOpen" alarm flag
Status: Device has "arrayCurrentOffset" alarm flag
Status: Device has "loadCurrentOffset" alarm flag
Status: Device has "p33SupplyOutOfRange" alarm flag
Status: Device has "p12SupplyOutOfRange" alarm flag
Status: Device has "hightInputVoltageLimit" alarm flag
Status: Device has "controllerReset" alarm flag
Status: Device has "loadLvd" alarm flag
Status: Device has "logTimeout" alarm flag
Status: Device has "eepromAccessFailure" alarm flag

item.name: Status: Array Faults
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Array Faults Modbus address:0x0022

trigger.name: Status: Device has "overcurrent" array faults flag
Status: Device has "mosfetSShorted" array faults flag
Status: Device has "software" array faults flag
Status: Device has "batteryHvd" array faults flag
Status: Device has "arrayHvd" array faults flag
Status: Device has "customSettingsEdit" array faults flag
Status: Device has "rtsShorted" array faults flag
Status: Device has "rtsNoLongerValid" array faults flag
Status: Device has "localTempSensorDamaged" array faults flag
Status: Device has "batteryLowVoltageDisconnect" array faults flag
Status: Device has "slaveTimeout" array faults flag
Status: Device has "dipSwitchChanged" array faults flag
Status: Device has "p3Fault" array faults flag

item.name: Status: Load Faults
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Load Faults Modbus address:0x002F

trigger.name: Status: Device has "externalShortCircuit" load faults flag
Status: Device has "overcurrent" load faults flag
Status: Device has "mosfetShorted" load faults flag
Status: Device has "software" load faults flag
Status: Device has "loadHvd" load faults flag
Status: Device has "highTempDisconnect" load faults flag
Status: Device has "dipSwitchChanged" load faults flag
Status: Device has "customSettingsEdit" load faults flag
Status: Device has "p3Fault" load faults flag
Status: Device has been restarted (uptime < 10m)
Status: Failed to fetch data (or no data for 5m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 5 minutes

item.name: Battery: Target Voltage
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Target Regulation Voltage Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:V Range:[0.0, 80.0] Modbus address:0x0024

item.name: Temperature: Ambient
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Ambient Temperature Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:deg C Range:[-128, 127] Modbus address:0x001C

item.name: Temperature: Battery
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Battery Temperature Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:deg C Range:[-128, 127] Modbus address:0x001B

trigger.name: Temperature: Low battery temperature (below {$BATTERY.TEMP.MIN.WARN}C for 5m)

dependency.name: Temperature: Critically low battery temperature (below {$BATTERY.TEMP.MIN.WARN}C for 5m)

trigger.name: Temperature: Critically low battery temperature (below {$BATTERY.TEMP.MIN.WARN}C for 5m)
Temperature: High battery temperature (over {$BATTERY.TEMP.MAX.WARN}C for 5m)

dependency.name: Temperature: Critically high battery temperature (over {$BATTERY.TEMP.MAX.CRIT}C for 5m)

trigger.name: Temperature: Critically high battery temperature (over {$BATTERY.TEMP.MAX.CRIT}C for 5m)

item.name: Temperature: Heatsink
item.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Heatsink Temperature Scaling Factor:1.0 Units:deg C Range:[-128, 127] Modbus address:0x001A

item_prototype.name: Battery: Voltage{#SINGLETON}
item_prototype.description: MIB: PROSTAR-PWM Description:Control State Modbus address:0x0021

dependency.name: Battery: Critically low battery voltage (below {#VOLTAGE.MIN.CRIT}V for 5m)

trigger_prototype.name: Battery: Critically low battery voltage (below {#VOLTAGE.MIN.CRIT}V for 5m)

dependency.name: Battery: Critically high battery voltage (over {#VOLTAGE.MAX.CRIT}V for 5m)

trigger_prototype.name: Battery: Critically high battery voltage (over {#VOLTAGE.MAX.CRIT}V for 5m)

item.host: Template Net Morningstar ProStar PWM SNMP
